summary: A young bored boy and his grandma decide to join hands and steal the crown jewels, after discovering that she used to be a jewel thief.
cast: Julia McKenzie|David Walliams|Miranda Hart|Reece Buttery|Jocelyn Jee Esien|Harish Patel|Rob Brydon|George Hill|Claudia Winkleman|Robbie Williams|India Ria Amarteifio|Leo Wringer|Tim Frances|Russell Dixon|Steve Speirs|Joanna Lumley|Patrick Brennan|Tim Bentinck|Max Olesker|Piers Delcore-Parker|Robin George|Michael Haydon|Hugh O'Brien|Tina Simmons|Glenn Webster|Chris Wilson
title: Gangsta Granny
